div.p: As of April 2, all Michigan K-12 school buildings are closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. For remote learning resources, click here. For all other information related to the impact of COVID-19 on ECS, please click here.

div.span: ECS is working to keep educational and food services going during the current closure.
Click below for a public notice regarding Monday's regularly scheduled Board of Education meeting.
Are you looking to make a difference in the lives of children in your community? Eastpointe Community Schools is now hiring for a variety of positions.
Sign up for our weekly community newsletter and get a glimpse into what's going on in our district!

p.a: Learn More About Eastpointe Community Schools

div.a: Click here for a video update from Dr. McLeod.

div.div: Schools Closed for Remainder of 2019-20 School Year

div.p: Today, April 2, 2020, Gov. Gretchen Whitmer closed all Michigan schools for the rest of the school year in response to the current COVID-19 pandemic.

a.aria-label: Schools Closed for Remainder of 2019-20 School Year

div.a: Click here for a video update from Dr. McLeod.

div.p: Eastpointe Community Schools remains committed to continuing to provide meals to our students through this unprecedented closure.
